name: @appik-studio/expo-parsely
description: Enhanced Expo plugin for Parse.ly Analytics SDK - comprehensive engagement tracking, heartbeat monitoring, and cross-platform analytics for React Native and Expo apps

scripts.release:patch: bun run bump:patch && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release patch version" && git push
scripts.release:minor: bun run bump:minor && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release minor version" && git push
scripts.release:major: bun run bump:major && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release major version" && git push
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:plugin
scripts.ios:refresh: bun run build:plugin && cd example && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-ios && bun run ios:pod-install && bun run ios
scripts.android:refresh: bun run build:plugin && cd example && bun run expo:prebuild-clean-android && bun run android

author: Livio Gamassia <livio@appik-studio.ch> (Appik-Studio)
